text: John Lapsley (born 24 November 1951) is a Scottish former footballer, who played for several Scottish Football League clubs in the 1970s and 1980s. Most of his league appearances were made with Airdrieonians, who he played for in the 1975 Scottish Cup Final. ==External links== * Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish footballers Category:Airdrieonians F.C. title: John Lapsley (footballer)
